medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 weeks ago, described as strong and painful, initially associated with dysuria and diarrhea. No fevers, chills, nausea, or vomiting. Treated with Cipro without relief. Developed intermittent constipation with diarrhea; last bowel movement was yesterday, characterized as loose and mucousy with no blood.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Ovarian cysts, uterine fibroids, hypertension (HTN), cervical dysplasia. Past surgical history includes cervical cryotherapy.
medical_history.family_history: Remote history of colon cancer in paternal grandfather; father has history of polyps; no other known malignancies.
